kalu sudu alu - iri rata hadathala - bakan nilamu.hari kalu sudu alu ekthara widiyakata warna thunak.kalu patata bahutharayak minissu kamathi naha ee eekenamayi penumayi nisama, kalu jiwitha anduru jiwitha kiyana hangimak kalu patin mathu unata kalukiyanneth me loke thiyena thawath eka patak, kalu pate prakashanaya thadayi, ee wage ma prabalayi,oonama deyak atharin ekawara ismathu wenna ee patata puduma hakiyawak thiyenawa, widyathmakawa baluwama siyalu ma warnayan ee warnaya awashoshanaya kara ganna nisa pariwarthitha warnayak naha,ithin darshanaya wenne kalu witharayi.
